subject: Hardware Recognition Issue - Pedals Not Detected at System Level
description_text:
Dear Technical Support Team,

I am writing to report a serious hardware recognition issue with my pedals.

*Issue Description:*
The pedals are completely undetected by my computer.

*Additional Symptom:*
The pedals have a blinking light issue (photo/video attached).

*Requested Information:*
Item Details
Order Number 1117556853843377 (aliexpress)
Windows Version  Windows 11
Drivers Installed No

*Attachments:*

   - Photo/video showing the blinking light issue

I understand that your pedals should work without additional drivers, so I
am unsure why the system is not detecting them at all.

I would appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue as soon as
possible.

Thank you for your support.

Best regards,
Dongwoo, Kim

conversations.body_text: Hi DONGWOO KIM,    May I ask if your order was purchased from the SIMSONN Official Store on AliExpress? At the moment, we’re unable to locate your order in our system.  Could you please help us with one of the following:    Send us a screenshot of the store name where you placed the order; or    Contact the seller you purchased from directly for order confirmation.    In the meantime, please try the following recovery steps:    Put the device into SIMSONN Flasher recovery mode;    Open the software and go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update;    Select the corresponding firmware (.sfu file) and proceed with the update.    ⚠️ Important notes:    Please connect the device to a USB 3.0 port (blue port) on the back of your PC;    Do not use USB 2.0 ports;    Do not use a USB hub.    If you have any updates or questions, feel free to contact us at any time.

Hi DONGWOO KIM,    ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-prox.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.
